title: I have got two mastery tokens, I have owned the champion permanently, but I can't upgrade to M6
body:
As the title says, I think I have met the second condition to upgrade, I have 2 M6 tokens and permanently owned champion(Wukong), so can you help me to figure it out how to upgrade? Because it seems I miss something, the upgrade cannot happen. 

Thanks:)

replies.body:
Hey there,

Do you have 2 Wukong mastery 6 tokens?

* Do you have a champion shard for Wukong?
* Do you have a champion permanent for Wukong?
* Do you have 500 Blue essence?

You need at least one of the above to unlock mastery level 6.

> Combine 2 Mastery tokens with a champ shard of the same champ, OR the champ permanent of the same champ, OR 500 blue essence, to unlock Level 6
Cheers for the reply. Solved it after a few wins to have a Wukong Shard.
I have the same problem. I got two mastery 6 tokens for Nasus and own Nasus but can't upgrade. Does anyone know what's the problem?
